sentences.en: A gust of wind pried loose a section of sheet-metal roofing.
sentences.cn: 一阵狂风把铺在屋顶上的一块金属片掀起来了。

sentences.en: a winding path
sentences.cn: 蜿蜒的小路

sentences.en: All they heard was the wind whispering through the treetops.
sentences.cn: 他们听到的只有风吹过树梢的飒飒声。

sentences.en: An automatic weather station feeds information on wind direction to the computer.
sentences.cn: 自动化气象站将风向信息输入计算机。

sentences.en: Both sides were troubled throughout by a capricious wind.
sentences.cn: 双方一直在为风向飘忽不定而苦恼。

sentences.en: Finding a second wind, he rode away from his pursuers.
sentences.cn: 他缓过劲儿来，骑马逃离了追赶他的人。

sentences.en: Goldsmith has repaired the roof to ensure the house is wind-proof.
sentences.cn: 戈德史密斯修理了屋顶，以确保房屋能够抗风。

sentences.en: he was clearly wound up and frantic about his daughter.
sentences.cn: 很明显，他被女儿气得发疯。

sentences.en: he was trying to put the wind up him with stories of how hard teaching was.
sentences.cn: 他正极力用教学如何如何困难的说法来吓唬他。

sentences.en: he wound up by attacking Nonconformists.
sentences.cn: 最终他选择攻击那些不信奉国教者。

sentences.en: he wound up the engine.
sentences.cn: 他加大马力。

sentences.en: His long, uncovered hair flew back in the wind.
sentences.cn: 他那露在外面的长发随风向后飞舞。

sentences.en: If a stranger stops you, just wind the window down a fraction.
sentences.cn: 如果有陌生人拦你的车，把车窗摇下一点点就行。

sentences.en: Kevin winds up in New York .
sentences.cn: 凯文终于抵达纽约。

sentences.en: Mortimer got wind of a plot being hatched.
sentences.cn: 莫蒂默听风声说有人正在策划阴谋。

sentences.en: my little flock scatters to the four winds.
sentences.cn: 我的一小群羊分散四方。

sentences.en: Planes were unable to take off because of high winds.
sentences.cn: 飞机因大风无法起飞。

sentences.en: she ran like the wind back to the house.
sentences.cn: 她飞快地跑回屋子。

sentences.en: She unbound her hair and let it flow loose in the wind.
sentences.cn: 她把头发解开，让它随风飘动。

sentences.en: she's only winding me up.
sentences.cn: 她只是捉弄我罢了。

sentences.en: The Bank of England seems determined to wind up the company.
sentences.cn: 英格兰银行似乎决心要关闭这家公司。

sentences.en: the company has since been wound up.
sentences.cn: 这家公司从此倒闭了。

sentences.en: the experiments had to be wound up because the funding stopped.
sentences.cn: 因为资金资助已停止，这些实验不得不被终止。

sentences.en: The hair is divided into sections and wound around heated rods.
sentences.cn: 头发被分成一绺绺缠绕在加热棒上。

sentences.en: The President is about to wind up his visit to Somalia.
sentences.cn: 总统即将结束对索马里的访问。

sentences.en: The soft wind breathed their names to the newborn grass.
sentences.cn: 轻风把他们的名字吹向刚刚长出的小草。

sentences.en: The wind blew from the northeast.
sentences.cn: 风从东北方向吹来。

sentences.en: The wind was bouncing the branches of the big oak trees.
sentences.cn: 一棵棵高大橡树的枝条随风摇摆。

sentences.en: Wind caught the sudden puff of dust and blew it inland.
sentences.cn: 风猛地刮起一阵灰尘，将它吹往内陆。

sentences.en: Wind turbines are large and noisy and they disfigure the landscape.
sentences.cn: 风力涡轮机个头大、噪音响，还会破坏周边风景。
